module.pgpcrypto.control

Class PGPKeyUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • module.pgpcrypto.control.PGPKeyUtils

  • public class PGPKeyUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides static methods for key management.
    Author:
    Stefan Werner

      • generateKeyPair

        public static org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPKeyRingGenerator generateKeyPair(int keySize,
                                                                           java.lang.String identity,
                                                                           char[] password)
                                                                    throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                           java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                                                           java.security.NoSuchProviderException,
                                                                           java.security.SignatureException,
                                                                           org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPException,
                                                                           java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Generates a new key pair.
        Parameters:
        keySize - the key size
        identity - the identity (name/email address)
        password - the password
        Returns:
        the PGP key ring generator
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O exception has occurred
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - if the key is invalid (for example invalid size)
        java.security.NoSuchProviderException - if the selected provider is not available
        java.security.SignatureException - if the signature cannot be generated
        org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPException - if a problem within the PGP subsystem occurred
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the selected algorithm is not available

        Checks if a public key collection usable.

        true, if usable

      • isPublicKeyRingUsable

        public static boolean isPublicKeyRingUsable(org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPPublicKeyRing keyRing,
                                            int minKeySize)
        Checks if is public key ring usable. Public key rings must provide a master key to check signatures and at least one signed subkey for encryption. Every subkey needs to be signed by the master key and/or some trusted external key. Keys must still be valid and must not be revoked. Also the key strength is checked.

        TODO: Add optional certification by third party key.

        Parameters:
        keyRing - the key ring
        minKeySize - the minimum key size (strength)
        Returns:
        true, if usable

      • isSecretKeyCollectionUsable

        public static boolean isSecretKeyCollectionUsable(org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPSecretKeyRingCollection collection,
                                                  int minKeySize)
        Checks if a secret key collection usable.
        Parameters:
        collection - the collection
        minKeySize - the minimum key size (strength)
        Returns:
        true, if usable

      • isSecretKeyRingUsable

        public static boolean isSecretKeyRingUsable(org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPSecretKeyRing keyRing,
                                            int minKeySize)
        Checks if is secret key ring usable. Secret key rings must provide a master key to check signatures and at least one signed subkey for encryption. Every subkey needs to be signed by the master key and/or some trusted external key. Keys must still be valid and must not be revoked. Also the key strength is checked.

        TODO: Add optional certification by third party key.

        Parameters:
        keyRing - the key ring
        minKeySize - the minimum key size (strength)
        Returns:
        true, if usable
